source.name: DCA Businesses with NY addresses
source.description:
Businesses actively licensed by DCA. Please note:
- In some cases, DCA gives businesses or individuals temporary permission to operate. These businesses or individuals will not appear in this data set. 
- Some legally operating sidewalk cafés and newsstands may not appear in this data set during the license review process which includes public hearings and other City approvals.
- Sightseeing guides, temporary amusement devices, and temporary street fair vendors are not included in this data set.
